name: Canaries in the Cave
description:
Canaries is the Cave is a short adventure platforming game that my girlfriend & I made as part of a 72-hour game jam.  You play as a canary working in the mines on your day off; Your friend seems to have been down there for some time now... You better go check on her.  Let's just hope that the swarms of bats haven't got to her... yet.

I did all of the programming and design for this project (my details can be found on my itch profile).  

Maddy did all of the illustrations and animations for this project.  Her Instagram is @MaddyyBoyce or alternatively you can contact her through her website (www,madeleineboyce.com).

All of the sound effects are taken from free sound and free to use.  The music was found on (www.purple-planet.com).

Thanks for taking the time to check out our entry for this game jam! We had a lot of fun making it.  Stay safe and as always: Don't forget to thoroughly dry out your tent before long-term storage!
